channel.title: Vengeance - Perfect Switching - Spawn Your Items - Targets - Wildstalker Helmets
channel.description:
[CENTER]Website: [URL=http://vengeanceps.com]Vengeance - Quality PvP In It's Finest Era[/URL]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/PeuUlPX.gif[/img]
[MOD=About]Quality Pvp in it's finest era. Vengeance strives to bring back the Pvp we all loved and more. The Vengeance PvP team has strived for one goal; to not be "just another server" claiming to be unique. Vengeance has tons of content to offer, and will always be the most unique 718 PvP experience you will ever see.[/MOD]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Emzp0VH.jpg[/img]
[SPOILER=Media][MOD=Media] [img]http://i.imgur.com/KvF5eY7.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/VHHlSTX.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1VJ9Q47.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/AH0lzmy.png[/img][/MOD][/SPOILER][/CENTER]
